titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain women's footwear not covering the ankle with coated or laminated textile fabrics.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/17/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on certain women's footwear not covering the ankle with coated or laminated textile fabrics.
